course_description: Film and media can be seen as queer practice(s) and forms that can be queered. Weekly screenings will be paired with readings and discussions about representations of LGBTQ+ people and the intersections with identity, race, and gender. Create queer(ed) texts in the form of moving image projects.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4529, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-3:45p, Instructor: D. Barba, Status: Open
